newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Basler Kantonalbank sets Monday briefing.
newsitem.headline: Basler Kantonalbank sets Monday briefing.

text.p: Basler Kantonalbank, a regional bank majority-owned by the Swiss Canton of Basle, said it will hold a news briefing on Monday at 0900 GMT in Zurich.
In a brief statement, the bank said that it planned the briefing to announce an "important strategic decision."
Market sources have speculated that the BKB will announce an expansion of its private banking activities.
There have been rumours in the market that the bank would seek to build up its private banking operations by taking on some of the team at what was formerly Swiss Volksbank.
Volksbank was part of the CS Holding Group, renamed January 1 as Credit Suisse Group as part of an extensive reorganisation.
